description: Nexxen won Best Cookieless Identification Technology at the 2025 Digiday Technology Awards for its Nexxen Discovery tool, which uses AI and contextual intelligence to provide privacy-safe advertising insights across digital channels.

title: Wix to Participate in Fireside Chat at Citi's 2025 Global TMT Conference
description: Wix.com Ltd. announced a $200 million increase to its share repurchase program and will participate in Citi's 2025 Global TMT Conference, highlighting improved business fundamentals and growth momentum.

title: Stock Market Today: Dow, S&P 500 Futures Tumble As Jobless Claims Increase— Walmart, Intuit, Ross Stores Earnings In Focus (UPDATED)
description: U.S. stock futures were slightly lower as the Jackson Hole Economic Symposium begins, with focus on Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell's upcoming speech and key corporate earnings reports from Walmart, Intuit, and Ross Stores.

title: BMO Announces Cash Distributions for Certain BMO ETFs and ETF Series of BMO Mutual Funds for August 2025
description: BMO Asset Management announced monthly cash distributions for select ETFs and ETF series of mutual funds, with distributions payable on September 3, 2025, for unitholders of record as of August 28, 2025.

title: A Rise In Surgical Robotics Could Send These 2 Healthcare Stocks Soaring
description: The robotic surgery market is rapidly expanding, growing from $800 million in 2015 to over $3 billion. Intuitive Surgical leads the market with its da Vinci system, while Medtronic is preparing to enter with its Hugo system, targeting significant untapped potential in surgical robotics.

title: Metallium Secures Exclusive Options for Additional U.S. Sites in Massachusetts and Virginia for E-Waste Metal Recovery
description: Metallium Ltd. has obtained exclusive lease options for two new e-waste processing sites in Massachusetts and Virginia, expanding its multi-state strategy for deploying metal recovery systems using Flash Joule Heating technology.

title: Magnite and Acxiom Forge Direct Integration to Enhance Addressable-Based Buying and Maximize Working Media in Streaming
description: Magnite and Acxiom have established an industry-first integration enabling advertisers to activate first-party and third-party data directly through Magnite's platform, reducing costs and improving ad campaign targeting in streaming and omnichannel media.

title: LendFriend Expands Crypto Mortgage Programs to California, Colorado, Florida, and Texas
description: LendFriend Mortgage LLC now offers mortgage solutions allowing homebuyers to use Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other digital assets to qualify for home loans without selling their crypto holdings, targeting high-net-worth crypto investors in states with high real estate and crypto adoption.

title: Shoals Technologies Group Appoints Aaron Zadeh as Country Manager, Pacific to Support the Acceleration of Solar Growth in the Region
description: Shoals Technologies Group appointed Aaron Zadeh as Country Manager for Pacific region, strengthening its presence in Australia's solar market. Zadeh brings over two decades of energy industry experience to support the company's expansion and renewable energy initiatives.

title: Syntec Optics (Nasdaq: OPTX) Assigns Decorated Veteran as Assistant Director, Strategic Military Sales & Customer Development
description: Syntec Optics appointed Louie Salinas, a retired U.S. Army Master Sergeant and decorated combat veteran, as Assistant Director of Strategic Military Sales & Customer Development, leveraging his military experience to strengthen defense product offerings.

title: In-Plant Logistics Market Set for $19.5 Billion Growth Opportunity by 2028
description: The in-plant logistics market is projected to grow from $12.3 billion in 2023 to $19.5 billion by 2028, driven by increasing automation and advanced technologies in manufacturing facilities, with Asia Pacific expected to experience the highest growth rate.

title: Gray Media Announces Pioneering Hyper-Personalized Video Streaming Strategy Using Google Cloud and Quickplay
description: Gray Media partners with Google Cloud and Quickplay to develop an advanced, AI-powered video streaming platform that delivers hyper-personalized content experiences across devices, with rollout planned for January 2026.

title: Bank7 Corp. Announces a 12.50% Quarterly Dividend Increase; Its Sixth Consecutive Annual Dividend Increase
description: Bank7 Corp. has increased its quarterly cash dividend by 12.50% to $0.27 per common share, marking its sixth consecutive annual dividend increase. The dividend will be paid on October 7, 2025, to shareholders of record as of September 19, 2025.

title: Dow Jones Bulls Await Fed Catalyst to Push Past 45K Barrier
description: Dow Jones investors are anticipating Fed Chair Powell's Jackson Hole speech as a potential catalyst to break through the 45,000 resistance level. Tech stocks have experienced recent weakness, but sector rotation in financials, energy, and consumer sectors may help cushion market volatility.

title: Purpose Launches Canadian Yield Shares, Defining a New Era in How Investors Earn Enhanced Monthly Income from Top Canadian Stocks
description: Purpose Investments introduces 10 new Canadian Yield Shares ETFs designed to provide enhanced monthly income from top Canadian stocks through a covered call strategy and moderate leverage, targeting both income and growth investors.

title: S&P 500: How $3 Trillion in Options Expiry Can Move Markets
description: Nearly $3 trillion in stock options are set to expire, with over half in S&P 500 options. The expiration could significantly impact market movements due to complex hedging strategies by banks and brokers, depending on market price fluctuations.

title: Fed Minutes Reveal Hawkish Officials Still In Control: Economist Says 16% Effective Tariffs Put Inflation 'On The Front Burner'
description: Federal Reserve minutes show officials maintaining a hawkish stance on inflation, with tariffs and potential price pressures keeping interest rates steady. The committee believes inflation risks outweigh unemployment risks, with a potential rate cut unlikely in the near term.

title: Money's Tight at NASA, so Expect More Space IPOs
description: NASA is planning to modify its Commercial Low Earth Orbit Destination program, potentially reducing financial commitments and requiring space companies to bear more costs for developing new private space stations to replace the International Space Station.

title: DiamiR Biosciences and Aptorum Group Announce New York State Approval for DiamiR's APOE Genotyping Test
description: DiamiR Biosciences received New York State approval for its APOE Genotyping test, which identifies genetic variants associated with late-onset Alzheimer's disease risk. The company is set to merge with Aptorum Group in an all-stock transaction expected to close in Q4 2025.

title: I-Mab to Participate in September Investor Conferences
description: I-Mab, a biotech company focused on immuno-oncology, announced participation in upcoming investor conferences and highlighted positive Phase 1b trial results for givastomig, a potential treatment for gastric cancers.

title: Evoke Pharma Announces Listing of New GIMOTI® Patent in FDA Orange Book
description: Evoke Pharma has received a new U.S. Patent for GIMOTI nasal spray, extending patent exclusivity to November 2038 for treating gastroparesis, reinforcing the company's long-term commercial strategy.

title: Unleashing the Spirit of Adventure: Breckenridge Distillery Launches Mountain Shot, a Bold New Mushroom-Infused Elixir
description: Breckenridge Distillery introduces Mountain Shot, a unique whiskey-based beverage infused with maitake mushrooms, offering chocolate and mint flavors in whiskey and malt varieties at 69 and 30 proof respectively.

title: BioStem Technologies Announces Insider Share Purchase by Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
description: BioStem Technologies' CEO Jason Matuszewski purchased 15,500 shares of company stock valued at approximately $100,000, increasing his total ownership to 1,145,362 shares.

title: Tenable Names Matthew Brown as Chief Financial Officer
description: Tenable has appointed Matthew Brown as its new Chief Financial Officer, succeeding Steve Vintz who was recently named Co-CEO. Brown brings over two decades of technology finance experience, previously serving as CFO of Altair Engineering and holding senior finance roles at multiple tech companies.

title: Beamr to Present at the H.C. Wainwright 27th Annual Global Investment Conference
description: Beamr Imaging, a video optimization technology company, will present virtually at the H.C. Wainwright 27th Annual Global Investment Conference in September 2025, showcasing its content-adaptive video compression technology used by major media companies.

title: Cyanoacrylate Adhesives Market worth $2.56 billion by 2029 at 2.9%, says MarketsandMarkets™
description: The global cyanoacrylate adhesives market is expected to grow from $2.22 billion in 2024 to $2.56 billion by 2029, with a 2.9% CAGR. Driven by demand in automotive, electronics, and medical industries, the Asia Pacific region is anticipated to be the fastest-growing market segment.

title: Lantronix to Participate in The Gateway Conference in September
description: Lantronix Inc. will participate in the 2025 Gateway Conference on September 3-4 in San Francisco, with CEO Saleel Awsare and CFO Brent Stringham participating in a fireside chat and holding one-on-one meetings.

title: BioCryst to Present at Upcoming Investor Conference
description: BioCryst Pharmaceuticals plans to present at the Cantor Global Healthcare Conference in New York on September 4, 2025, offering a live audio webcast of their presentation.

title: Enterprises Are Struggling to Make Generative AI Work. That's Great News for IBM.
description: MIT research reveals 95% of AI pilot programs fail to make meaningful impact, with poor integration being the primary issue. IBM is successfully navigating this challenge by offering comprehensive AI consulting and integration services, generating over $7.5 billion in generative AI bookings.

title: Where Will Archer Aviation Be in 1 Year?
description: Archer Aviation, an eVTOL (electric vertical takeoff and landing) company, has seen significant stock growth without selling a single aircraft, backed by a $6 billion order book and $1 billion in cash, with potential to transform urban transportation.

title: This Is My Favorite Dividend Stock (by Far)
description: Microsoft demonstrates strong financial performance with double-digit revenue and operating income growth, consistent dividend increases, and strategic investments in AI and cloud technologies, making it an attractive dividend stock despite its low yield.

title: Here's Why I'm Not Buying the Dip in Nvidia's Stock
description: Nvidia reported extraordinary quarterly results with $44.1 billion revenue, up 69% year-over-year, but an analyst warns of potential risks due to high valuation, tough future comparisons, and potential competitive challenges in the AI chip market.

title: Scilex Holding Company (Nasdaq: SCLX) Announces Its Majority-Owned Subsidiary, Semnur Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (“Semnur”), and Denali Capital Acquisition Corp. Have Entered into a Purchase Agreement with an Investor for a $20 Million Private Placement at $16.00 per share and Jaisim Shah, Scilex’s CEO and President, Will be Dedicated to Semnur on a Full Time Basis to Rapidly Advance SP-102 to Regulatory Approval and Commercialization for the Treatment of Lumbosacral Radicular Pain (LRP)/Sciatica
description: Scilex's majority-owned subsidiary Semnur Pharmaceuticals entered a $20 million private placement agreement with an investor. CEO Jaisim Shah will now focus full-time on Semnur, while Henry Ji becomes Scilex's new CEO, to advance SP-102's clinical development for lumbosacral radicular pain treatment.

title: Bilibili Inc. Announces Second Quarter 2025 Financial Results
description: Bilibili reported strong Q2 2025 financial performance with 20% year-over-year revenue growth, reaching RMB7.34 billion. The company achieved net profit of RMB218.3 million, improved from a net loss in the previous year, driven by growth in advertising, mobile games, and value-added services.

title: Ducommun to Participate in Jefferies Industrials Conference
description: Ducommun Incorporated's CEO Stephen G. Oswald will participate in the Jefferies Industrials Conference on September 3, 2025, presenting at 3:30 p.m. Eastern and conducting investor meetings.

title: INVESTIGATION NOTICE: Girard Sharp Law Firm Encourages Former or Current 3M Company (NYSE:MMM) Investors Who Received Neogen Corporation (NASDAQ:NEOG) Shares in Connection With Neogen Corporation’s Acquisition of 3M Company’s Food Safety Business in September 2022 to Contact the Firm
description: Girard Sharp is investigating potential securities claims for 3M investors who received Neogen shares after the Food Safety Business acquisition in September 2022, following significant financial challenges including a $456.3 million net loss and material weaknesses in financial reporting.

title: Cytotoxic Drugs & HPAPI Manufacturing Market Industry Trends and Global Forecasts to 2035 | Over 140 Players Now Active in HPAPI & Cytotoxic Drug Contract Manufacturing
description: The global cytotoxic drugs and HPAPI manufacturing market is projected to grow from $11.7 billion to $39.9 billion by 2035, with a CAGR of 11.6%. Over 140 players are active in contract manufacturing, with Europe leading the market and increasing demand for targeted therapies driving growth.

title: 1 Unstoppable Stock That Could Join Nvidia, Microsoft, and Apple in the $3 Trillion Club
description: Alphabet (Google) is positioned to potentially join the $3 trillion valuation club, demonstrating strong performance in search and cloud computing despite AI disruption fears. The company's robust revenue growth, cheap valuation, and strategic AI integration make it an attractive investment.
